link.script: (function(){function iv(a){if(a.nodeName=='SOURCE'){a = a.nextSibling;}if(typeof a !== 'object' || a === null || typeof a.getBoundingClientRect!=='function'){return false}var b=a.getBoundingClientRect();return((a.innerHeight||a.clientHeight)>0&&b.bottom+50>=0&&b.right+50>=0&&b.top-50<=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&b.left-50<=(window.innerWidth||document.documentElement.clientWidth))}function ll(){var a=document.querySelectorAll('[data-swift-image-lazyload]');for(var i in a){if(iv(a[i])){a[i].onload=function(){window.dispatchEvent(new Event('resize'));};try{if(a[i].nodeName == 'IMG'){a[i].setAttribute('src',(typeof a[i].dataset.src != 'undefined' ? a[i].dataset.src : a[i].src))};a[i].setAttribute('srcset',a[i].dataset.srcset);a[i].setAttribute('sizes',a[i].dataset.sizes);a[i].setAttribute('style',a[i].dataset.style);a[i].removeAttribute('data-swift-image-lazyload')}catch(e){}}}requestAnimationFrame(ll)}requestAnimationFrame(ll)})();

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_1 fusion-one-full fusion-column-first fusion-column-last 1_1

h4.strong: Menard ISD is seeking a high school principal. Please send application and resume to Amy Bannowsky at amy.bannowsky@menardisd.net.

div.p: Menard ISD is seeking an instructional interventionist. Responsibilities will include instructional coaching, data collection and desegregation, and providing academic and behavior interventions to students primarily on the elementary/junior high campus. Please send application and resume to Blenda Wright at blenda.wright@menardisd.net or call 325-396-2348.

p.br: Menard ISD is seeking a secondary history teacher and coach. Please send application and resume to Cheryl Kruse at cheryl.kruse@menardisd.net or call 325-396-2513.

div.h3: Free Grab and Go Meals (3 Day Pak) pick up for MISD students on Monday and Thursday from 11:30-12:30 at the Elementary & Junior High Building
div.p: Packet pick up and drop off on Tuesdays, April 7th, April 14th, April 21st and April 28th from 11:30-12:30 at your child’s campus.

br.a: Menard County and City Disaster Declaration
Travel Letter for Packets and Lunches
STAAR EOC and STAAR Assessment Changes

span.a: Educational Resources for COVID-19 Virtual Learning

p.a: Center for Disease Control and Prevention

br.a: Texas Department of State Health Services

div.h3: MISD School Board Meeting will be held on Wednesday, May 13, 2020 @ 7:00 p.m. Menard Administration Office 221 East San Saba St.
